title: Band of Brothers
description: Follows Easy Company, a unit of the 506th Parachute Infantry Regiment during World War II, from training to the end of the war.

title: The Pacific
description: A companion series to 'Band of Brothers', depicting the Pacific Theater of World War II through the experiences of U.S. Marines.

title: Saving Private Ryan
description: After the Normandy invasion, a group of soldiers goes behind enemy lines to find and bring back Private James Ryan.
During World War I, two British soldiers are given an urgent mission to deliver a message that could save 1,600 men.

title: Hacksaw Ridge
description: The true story of Desmond Doss, a medic who served in WWII without carrying a weapon and saved 75 men during the Battle of Okinawa.

title: Dunkirk
description: A visually stunning retelling of the Dunkirk evacuation, told from three perspectives: land, sea, and air.

title: Fury
description: A seasoned tank commander leads his crew on a dangerous mission behind enemy lines in the final months of World War II.

title: Schindler's List
description: The powerful story of Oskar Schindler, who saved the lives of over a thousand Jewish refugees during the Holocaust.

title: Black Hawk Down
description: An intense retelling of the 1993 U.S. military mission in Somalia, where soldiers struggle to survive a chaotic battle.

title: The Thin Red Line
description: A philosophical and poetic depiction of the Battle of Guadalcanal in World War II.
